Class Organization¶

class src.entities.org.Organization.Organization(cif, org_name)[source]¶

Organization class This class aim to models the organization objects and it also acts like an container of the organization’s info such as list of agents, promotions, categories, etc.

__init__(cif, org_name)[source]¶

Init method Creates a new instance of Organization

Parameters:
  • cif – Organization’s ID
  • org_name – Organization’s name
Returns:

Organization object
__module__ = 'src.entities.org.Organization'¶

String method This method allows printing Organization objects in a easier way

Returns:String containing organization info

Add agent method Allows to add a new agent to the organization agents list

Best agent This method evaluates the agents who work at the organization an returns the best on according to the sales results
